skillTree.localised_description: The palanquins of Nurgle are ornate thrones decorated in mouldering finery and decaying cushions.
A colossal Daemon-insect, whose appearance is so repugnant it leaves festering scars upon the mind.
The Fly Lord and his devotees despise Tzeentch, for his obsession with schemes and trickery are the polar opposite of Nurgle's delight in slow, musty stagnation.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

skillTree.localised_description: Anything fired at this vile Nurglish servant's immense girth must penetrate many folds of sweaty fat before they even have the slightest chance of piercing his flesh.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Aspect of the Dread Knight Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Aspect of the Dread Knight"

Cooldown: -50% to "Aspect of the Dread Knight"

Miscast base chance: -15% for "Aspect of the Dread Knight Upgraded"

Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Doom & Darkness"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Doom & Darkness Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Doom & Darkness Upgraded"

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Fate of Bjuna"
Overcast spell: "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "The Purple Sun of Xereus"

Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Well built, robust. Powerful.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Unusually subtle for one so foul, this one is skilled in spreading Nurgle's insanitary ways and words across the land.
This one finds the enemy can barely stand to come near them, let alone attack.

effects.description:
Melee attack: -1 for enemy units
	(enemy armies in local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When this one's countless lesions and warts finish weeping and harden up, a natural, protective carapace is left behind in their place.
If a population are confined to their toilets or beds at home they're not able to spread dissent and sedition as readily, if at all.
Ogres aside, being this large and ungainly would almost certainly kill most other creatures, but when you're beloved of the Urfather it is actually an advantage.
This Plagueridden shares his greatest concoctions and darkest secrets with his allies willingly, ever eager to see what new afflictions will offer his friends.

effects.description:
Health: +4% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The calcified growths extruding from this plague-ridden hero are at the behest of a gift, one to be shared with friends and allies.

effects.description:
Melee defense: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The joy of sharing such a noble cause with his fellows make this plaguebearer an eager apostle to all his allies.

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The determination to stand, even when a battle-line is failing. To persevere at bringing the love of the Grandfather to all. In the face of such wonderous dedication, is it a wonder that others will follow?

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -6% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Slowly eating away at those around him, the rot infests those not yet blessed by Nurgle.

effects.description:
Armor: -4 for enemy units
	(enemy armies in local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A swarm of bloated flies drone endlessly in battle, intercepting the blows of foes with their own bodies in selfless sacrifice for their allies.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: -5% for enemy units
	(enemy armies in local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Authority over rot is this one's talent, the ability to bring forth the worst of their cloying contagion.

effects.description: Passive ability: Heart of the Storm

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An emerald haze surrounds this wizard, the lurid stench of diseased winds eternally at his call.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: From death, life; from life, death. The cycle of rebirth is this one's mantra, a gentle but firm belief that holds as true in magic as in war.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A grotesque hulk of a being, unnaturally tough even by the standards of his kind, and augmented by unearthly force behind every strike.
Beneath layers of phlegm, flesh, and ooze lie vulnerable organs. /Very/ deep down.
Devastating blows lay waste to multiple men with every strike, breaking through defensive formations.
